me.title: Who am I ?
me.description-1: Austin-William Lo, 3rd year student at Epitech to become an Information Technology Expert after a BAC +5.
me.description-2: I learned various programming languages ​​such as C, C ++, Python, Flutter (Dart) or JavaScript through Haskell through small and large service in order to be ready to work in a business. Whether for personal or professional service, I learned to be autonomous, to work in a team and to adapt to any situation.
me.description-3: I would like to work in a professional context during an internship and I am at your disposal for any questions.

job-1.description: Currently a 3rd year student at Epitech to become an Information Technology Expert.

job-2.description: Internship to start my 2nd year at Epitech and have a first professional experience. The internship consisted in developing an online CV generator specific to their specifications for prestataires.
job-2.description-2: The generator was developed in ReactJS and used a basic API to fetch data from Linagora API. Writing documentation for the application and users were part of my missions. As a bonus, I was able to explore the backend side of the app with Nginx to connect the app to their database.

hobbies.title: What I do during my free time
hobbies.hobby-5: Get out in the fresh air because it's important to get some fresh air to feel good

footer.title: Do you want to know more about me ?
footer.description: Contact me for more information with LinkedIn, Github, or by email.
